name: King's Choice (itch)
description:
Decision making game for Curdle Jam 25. 

You are a King, and must decide on the fate of the peasants brought before you. You can either have them executed or spare them. There are 5 endings: two bad endings, a mediocre ending, and a good ending with two variations. Can you find them all?

Controls:

Arrow keys to menu

Space/Enter to select
